name: Listened to Miami’s future in conference realignment

content.html:
Carlos Ledo of the MIA All-Day podcast joins Manny to discuss Thursday’s news of UCLA and USC leaving for the Big Ten conference and how the potential of the Big Ten and SEC to create super conferences could affect the University of Miami. They also discuss Miami’s successful run on the recruiting trail and Legends Camp. Manny shares interviews from last week’s Legends Camp with Canes greats Bryant McKinnie, Sean Spence and Greg Mark. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

By Wide Right: A show about the Miami Hurricanes
